adDetails: Location - Intersection of Stelling and Stevens Creek in Cupertino Group (3-4 students) tutoring for grades: K to 8th (all subjects) - 20 hours per month Algebra 1, Geometry, Algebra 2/Trig - 20 hours per month School-year program - Help with home work, review concepts, extra practice in class Summer program - Review previous year Math, prepare next year Math, work on improving grammar and vocabulary, learn basic science concepts for grades K to 8th Tutors: Sapna - BS in Math, MS in Systems Engineering, AA in Early Childhood Education Sanjay - BS and MS in Electrical Engineering, MBA in Finance Natasha - Graduating Monta Vista High School in Cupertino, starting SJSU in Fall Open timings- M to Th - 4pm to 8pm Sat & Sun - 11am to 6pm Summer timings M to F - 10am to 6pm Hourly slots available. No partial hour and no makeup for absences. For more info, call/text Sapna at show contact info.
